update TOM_EXAM_ANSWER_DETAILS
EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOPIC_ID=#{topicId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

SCORE=#{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TOPIC_ID=#{topicId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TOM_EXAM_ANSWER_DETAILS
EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TOPIC_ID=#{topicId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and STATUS='N'
